channel.title: Export to Latex?
channel.description: Hi, I'm considering moving my writing to Drafts. I'm writing a thesis and the thesis is in Latex. Is there a way to export notes from Drafts to Latex files?

item.title: Export to Latex?
item.dc:creator: sylumer
item.description:
I would consider using pandoc as an intermediary tool for this as Drafts is geared around simpler Markdown or plain text content, whereas Latex is more of a whole typesetting solution.

https://pandoc.org

Read full topic
